EmailTemplate.subject: This Month in Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This Month in Spring February 2019 Hi, Spring fans! What a wild ‘n’ crazy month it's been! The beginning of the year is a time for celebration for many reasons, not least of which is because we mark off another year in “This Week in Spring,” the weekly chronicle of all things in Springdom that I maintain over at the Spring blog <[[https://spring.io/blog?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-february-2019]]> (from which I pull most of the content for these monthly This Month in Spring roundups).
I've been making good progress on my Reactive Spring book <[[http://www.reactivespring.io/]]>, too. Follow @ReactiveSpring <[[https://twitter.com/ReactiveSpring]]> for more.
January was the first full month of my new podcast, A Bootiful Podcast <[[https://soundcloud.com/a-bootiful-podcast]]>, which I hope you'll subscribe to on Soundcloud, iTunes <[[https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/a-bootiful-podcast/id1438691771?mt=2]]>, or wherever fine podcasts are downloaded. Follow @BootifulPodcast <[[https://twitter.com/BootifulPodcast]]> for more. For all of my January highlights, click the link below!
The Long and short of it <[[https://content.pivotal.io/josh-blog/this-month-in-spring-january-2019?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-february-2019]]>
Meet the SpringOne Tour in St. Louis
In February, the SpringOne Tour bus will make stops in St. Louis, Washington, D.C., and Columbus, OH. Visit our tour page <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-february-2019]]> for more information on upcoming stops, including upcoming dates in Europe.
Reserve your seat <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-february-2019]]>
Spring Professional Training and Certification
Did you know that Pivotal offers training courses and certification for developers, architects, system administrators, and technical managers? We offer courses on Core Spring, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud Data Flow, and Spring Cloud.
Learn more and get certified <[[https://spring.io/services?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-february-2019]]>
